parameters.jsCode:
return [
  // Original 3
  { json: { competitor: "Duolingo", focus: "Gamification and daily streaks" } },
  { json: { competitor: "Babbel", focus: "Practical Conversation and grammar" } },
  { json: { competitor: "Rosetta Stone", focus: "Full immersion without translations" } },
  // Your requested additions
  { json: { competitor: "DuoCards", focus: "Flashcards based on browser/video snippets" } },
  { json: { competitor: "Anki", focus: "Spaced Repetition System (SRS) for power users" } },
  { json: { competitor: "Google Translate", focus: "General utility/speed translation" } },
  { json: { competitor: "DeepL", focus: "High-accuracy contextual translation" } },
  { json: { competitor: "Reverso Context", focus: "Sentence examples and idiomatic usage" } },
  { json: { competitor: "Memrise", focus: "Real-world video clips and vocabulary drills" } },
  { json: { competitor: "Busuu", focus: "Structured courses with community feedback" } },
  { json: { competitor: "Pimsleur", focus: "Audio-based conversational patterns" } },
  { json: { competitor: "Linguee", focus: "Dictionary with bilingual text comparisons" } },
  { json: { competitor: "Drops", focus: "Visual-based rapid vocabulary learning" } },
  { json: { competitor: "Clozemaster", focus: "Learning vocabulary in context through cloze tests" } },
  { json: { competitor: "Leo Dictionary", focus: "German-specific deep-dive dictionary and forums" } }
];

parameters.text:
=Role: Expert Language Learning Product Strategist.

Context: I am building a V1 MVP for an English speaker learning German. The core "Magic Moment" is a smart lookup tool that replaces the friction of Google Translate.

Input Data: Here are the competitors analyzed: {{ $json.competitor }}.

Product Constraints (V1):

Input Method: Text-only keyboard input (no camera/voice).

The "Search-to-Dive" Feature: As a user types a partial word (e.g., "Hu"), the app should suggest the full word with its article ("Der Hund") and English translation ("Dog").

The Deep-Dive: Once selected, the user gets an instant explanation of forms (plural, case changes) and "Learn More" options.

Scope: Pure lookup only. No "Save to List" or account creation yet.

Simplicity: No integration with external apps.

Task: > 1. Refine the Problem Statement based specifically on the "Search-to-Deep-Dive" friction you identified. 2. Draft a User Persona for "The Intentional German Learner" who needs this specific deep-dive. 3. List 3 User Stories that focus ONLY on the lookup and deep-dive functionality. 4. Suggest the Target Output Schema (JSON format) that my n8n workflow should return to the frontend to power the "Der Hund" suggestion and deep-dive data.
